text: Antoni Pizà (Felanitx, 1962), musicologist. He is the Director of the Foundation for Iberian Music and a member of the doctoral faculty in music at City University of New York's Graduate Center.Foun & tion for Iberian MusicCity University of New York. Faculty page: Antoni Pizà He has curated events with some of the major musical figures of the 21st century including Charles Rosen, Philip Glass, Claire Chase, Kronos Quartet's David Harrington, Roger Scruton, Greil Marcus, Richard Taruskin, Paul Griffiths, and others.http://music21.ws.gc.cuny.edu/about/ == Bibliography == * La dansa de l'arquitecte; Muro: Ensiola, 2012; * En la república del ruido: Crónicas musicales de Nueva York; Palma: Documenta, 2012; * Nits simfòniques; Muro: Ensiola, 2010; * J.B.
